plot: A doomed relationship between a frustrated deaf woman and a lazy man who meet through a smart phone dating application. The story is told through short unedited vignettes.
title: Off Yer 'Ead
plot_es: A doomed relationship between a frustrated deaf woman and a lazy man who meet through a smart phone dating application. The story is told through short unedited vignettes.
